author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: South Africa begins three-week lockdown
description: Police and the army patrol the streets as all but essential movement is banned across the country.
content:
Media captionCoronavirus: South Africa prepares for three-week lockdown
South African security forces have begun enforcing a three-week nationwide lockdown in an effort to stem the spread of the coronavirus.
All but essential movement is forbidden and both … [+2280 chars]
